Pursuant to Rule 11.20b of the Council and §20-226 or §20-225 of the New York City Administrative Code, the Council resolves that the action of the Department of Consumer Affairs approving an unenclosed sidewalk café located at 550 Hudson Street, Community Board No. 2, Application no.  20145095 TCM, shall be subject to review by the Council.

Items.MinutesNote: The President Pro Tempore (Council Member Comrie)

The presence of a quorum was announced by The President Pro Tempore (Council Member Comrie).

There is a vacancy in the Council (16th Council District, The Bronx) pending the swearing-in of the certified winner of the November 5, 2013 General Election for this seat.
